db:select.doc:name: orders from Northwind
db:select.db:sql: SELECT orders.*, offers.OfferID, offers.DateApproved FROM orders, offers WHERE orders.OrderID = offers.OrderID

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { orderID: payload01.OrderID, offerID: payload01.OfferID, employeeID: payload01.EmployeeID default 0, customerID: payload01.CustomerID default "", acceptedDate: payload01.DateApproved as String default "", shippedDate: payload01.ShippedDate as String default "", shipVia: payload01.ShipVia default 0 }

db:select.doc:name: order by ID from Northwind
db:select.db:sql: SELECT orders.OrderID, orders.CustomerID, orders.EmployeeID, orders.ShippedDate, orders.ShipVia, offers.OfferID, offers.DateApproved FROM orders, offers WHERE orders.OrderID = offers.OrderID AND orders.OrderID = :orderID

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { orderID: payload01.OrderID, offerID: payload01.OfferID, employeeID: payload01.EmployeeID default 0, customerID: payload01.CustomerID default "", acceptedDate: payload01.DateApproved as String default "", shippedDate: payload01.ShippedDate as String default "", shipVia: payload01.ShipVia default 0 }

db:select.doc:name: Select Shipping Address from customers
db:select.db:sql: SELECT Address from customers WHERE CustomerID = :customerID

db:insert.doc:name: Insert a post into db
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO Orders (CustomerID, EmployeeID, OrderDate, ShippedDate, ShipVia, ShipAddress) VALUES (:CustomerID, :EmployeeID, :OrderDate, :ShippedDate, :ShipVia, :ShipAddress)
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ CustomerID: payload.customerID, OfferID: payload.offerID, EmployeeID: payload.employeeID, OrderDate: payload.acceptedDate, ShippedDate: payload.shippedDate, ShipVia: payload.shipVia, ShipAddress: vars.shippingAddress[0] }]

db:select.doc:name: Select OrderID
db:select.db:sql: SELECT OrderID FROM orders WHERE CustomerID = :customerID
